EmailTemplate.name: New User info missing - html day 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Live Different Builds Registration is not complete.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Don't stop now, your almost Registered!
We need a bit more information from you...
Oops! You missed a step!
We need some more information from you before we can accept your registration.
Please login in to your 'My Live Different' Account and complete the process.
Question? Contact us at (866) 432 4464 or info@livedifferent.com
Never believe that a few caring people can't change the world. For, indeed, that's all who ever have. -Margaret Mead
LiveDifferent PO Box 20047 Brandon South, Brandon, MB R7A 6Y8 (866) 432 4464
